channel.title: PYTHON on Nathan Obert
channel.description: Recent content in PYTHON on Nathan Obert

item.title: Python HTTP Server
item.description: python http server If you need a quick and easy webserver to copy files between servers, or from your server to your workstation all you need is Python, which is part of YUM and is on almost every redhat based linux server. Simple goto the directory you want to share, and a single command in the shell will start up a webserver that you can use to get your files copied over.
